TopicTitle: Lego8_bit's Turbo Rover Contenetail race. BUILD PHASE!

Articles.Content:
hello I am lego8_bit

I was looking though the forums today and saw that Modular wheels from TT was updated for 24.2 and .25 that got me thinking why not have a Grand continental race around kerbin's continents.

Now since this has one mod I was talking about this WILL BE A MOD FREINDLY challenge for Dark multiplayer and single player.

Rules:

1.*MODS REQUIRED TO INSTALL* (but if you decide not to build with the mods that's fine.) Mod friendly includes : B9 aerospace, LLL, LLL+, KST++, Modular Wheels 7.2 and KAS, Near Future Electric.

2. Must use Modular Wheels and engines only to power your vehicles.

3. CANNOT USE INFINITE FUEL of ANY TYPE or any cheat whatsoever.

4. There will be 2 types of rover classes Truck rovers(black) and car rovers(red)

5. Be creative with the mods I've listed.

6. Post what type of engines you've used and how many. and what wheel type you used. Also get me the estimated HP of the vehicle By adding the total amount of hp by (RMB) and engine count.

7. you also must build a glider for your vehicle that can detach midflight if the race is on the different continent, OR you crashed Leave a piece of Debris were you last crashed and once you reach that point detach the glider from there.

8. If your planning on doing this event on your Dark Multiplayer server or Servers Post a link of the ip.

9. On Truck Rovers (using Truck wheels) You must use the Big yellow engine I don't care how many you use but as a supercharging effect (OPTIONAL!! )you may choose one other engine type from the cars but must Be Half the amount of engines of the yellow engines (EXAMPLE: 4 big yellow engines 2 Box engines.) hope that clarifies some confusion.

10. Post how long you got to destination and how many attempts you made. (Servers additional rule How many players Participated in the event.)

11a. If you run out of fuel you have the option to use a re-fueler from KAS or the claw from stock to refuel your vehicle I also RECOMEND building a tanker truck for this reason that can go Long distance trips.

11B.

Forum name: (EXAMPLE) Date: (05/15/94)

Vehicle name: (Turbotastic MK1 example)

Engine type: (boxer) # of Engines: (5) Total Engine HP: (200)

Wheel type: (red)

Picture or (HTTP LINK HERE)

And your overall top speed: (124.5 m/s)

ok that should be a good start on the rules however the rules will change from time to time so keep an eye out on that or subscribe to the thread if need be.

Ok I will post a bit more info later on where the event should take place I welcome Everyone who participates and have fun building Whacky and Very insanely fast cars.

ok starting from 10/28/14 to 11/10/14 I want everyone to Build and test there cars I will post the first picture to where you need to go after the build period is done. so post your veicles before ya race as a friendly reminder.

10/28/14* ok Since people were asking for the mods directly here are the links for them:

Modular wheels 7.2 https://beta.kerbalstuff.com/mod/151/Modular%20MultiWheels

GOOD LUCK and again have fun

Lego8_bit/Legofreak

Edited October 29, 2014 by Lego8_bit
Can we have the option to use those mods and not be required to use them? Other than that, reserved for entry.

Can we have the option to use those mods and not be required to use them? Other than that, reserved for entry.

yes you can I did not know what I thinking last night when I was writing this up. but I was trying to say that in a way. however As a requirement you MUST use Modular wheels mod for your vehicle that your building.

Edited October 28, 2014 by Lego8_bit

however As a requirement you MUST use Modular wheels mod for your vehicle that your building.
